price: Waɗanda suka kãfirta suna da azãba mai tsanani kuma waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni, kuma suka aikata ayyukan ƙwarai, sunã da wata gãfara da sakamako mai girma.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٞ شَدِيدٞۖ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٞ وَأَجۡرٞ كَبِيرٌ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna kafarū lahum ʿadhābun shadīdun wa-alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti lahum maghfiratun wa-ajrun kabīrun
